rasa katha kima pasuwata thaba palamuwa was gunawardhana mahatha pilibandawa katha kirima hondaya.paudgalikawa gath kala warthamanaye mage priyathama polis niladhariyada ethumaya.matha kalinawa ethuma wadath prachalitha wuye kahawaththe minimaruwan nithiye rahanata hasukaraganima nisaya.kahawaththe janathawata nidahase husmak gannata ida salasa dunne ethumaya.rohan oolugala mahathagen pasuwa kahawaththe janathawa wishwasaya thabu polis niladhariyeku sitiyanam ee was gunawardhana mahathaya.siyalu chodana walin walin ethuma nirdoshi wanu athayi prarthana karami.manda ewan niladharin athyawashaya yugaya me kalaya nisaya.

eheth me ek jayagrahanayak samangawath eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya mewara labu jayagrahanaya sansandanaya karanna amaruyi. 1989 sita ek wathawak pamanayi deshapalana pakshayak parlimenthuwa thula pahadili bahutharayak labagena sthawara rajayak bihi kale.1994 di podujana eksath peramuna jayagrahanaya kalath owunta rajaya pawathwagena yanna sesu deshapalana pakshawala sahayogaya athyawashya wuna. 2000 dith ehemayi. 2001 di ejapaya jaya gaththath owunta parlimenthuwe sarala bahutharayata wada wadi aasana kihipayakuyi thibune.
